snippet.title: RIBBY: THE GAME: The Demo - The Trailer
snippet.description:
🐸DEMO AVAILABLE NOW! 🐸

The Demo of Ribby: The Game releases October 14, and will be attending this year's Frog Con 2022! See you there!

It's Ribby: The Game! An RPG/Visual Novel hybrid about acceptance, friends, and frogs! Ribbit.

Follow the story of Ribecca "Ribby" Brown, an altruistic frog girl on a journey to get back home - hoping to make some friends along the way and discover things she doesn't yet know about herself.

Looking inward is always a daunting task, especially when you're afraid of what you'll find.

Check out Frog Con:
https://frogcon.frogcult.org/pages/games

Itch Page
https://octolivvy.itch.io/ribbythegamedemo

Steam Page
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1742740/Ribby_The_Game/
